channel.title: CVE Feed for Danyil Vasilenko -- Bolt Browser
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Danyil Vasilenko -- Bolt Browser

item.title: CVE-2020-7370|2024-08-04T09:25:49.040Z -- danyil%20vasilenko -- bolt%20browser
item.description: User Interface (UI) Misrepresentation of Critical Information vulnerability in the address bar of Danyil Vasilenko's Bolt Browser allows an attacker to obfuscate the true source of data as presented in the browser. This issue affects the Bolt Browser version 1.4 and prior versions.
